p: Then, we specifically mapped the DEGs to KEGG pathways database terms ( Fig 4). Results suggested that hundreds of KEGG pathways were readily found, among which 30 pathways in A549 cells were significantly altered ( p < 0.01). We found that several innate immune response pathways were enriched, including NF-kB signaling pathway, cytokine-cytokine receptor, and the IL-17 signaling pathway, indicating that the natural immune response plays a significant role in host resistance to IBV infection.
